Qui.description: Person or group name. For multiple people, separate with commas (e.g., 'Dorcopsis, Sika, Merionne, Charlotte')

Type.description: Type of fundraising activity (e.g., Bar Pi, Début d'année)

Détails.description: Additional details about the activity (can be empty)

oneOf.description: Single amount in euros (positive for income, negative for expenses)
Array of individual amounts for each person (when Qui contains multiple people separated by commas)

Montant.description: Amount(s) in euros. Use a single number for equal split, or an array for individual amounts
